tool_description: Identifies and analyzes shared DNA segments between profiles, calculating segment lengths and positions across chromosomes.

profile_1_id.description: Identifier of the first DNA profile

profile_2_id.description: Identifier of the second DNA profile

min_segment_length.description: Minimum segment length in centimorgans to report

min_snp_density.description: Minimum number of SNPs required in a segment

chromosome_range.description: Array of chromosome numbers to analyze (1-22), or null for all autosomes

error_messages: Profile not found: One or both profile IDs do not exist in the system.
Invalid segment parameters: min_segment_length must be positive, min_snp_density must be >= 100.
Invalid chromosome range: Chromosome numbers must be between 1 and 22.
Insufficient data: Not enough SNP density for reliable segment detection.
Analysis failed: Unable to complete segment matching due to data quality issues.
usage: Provide two profile IDs and optionally set minimum segment criteria and chromosome range. Returns identified shared DNA segments with positions and lengths.

total_segments.description: Total number of shared segments identified

segment_chromosomes.description: Array of chromosome numbers containing shared segments

segment_lengths.description: Array of segment lengths in centimorgans

longest_segment.description: Length of the longest shared segment in centimorgans
